integrations_researched.name: gantt-task-react

imports: import { Gantt, Task, EventOption, StylingOption, ViewMode, DisplayOption } from 'gantt-task-react';
api_patterns.initialization: Task data structure with id, name, type, start, end, progress, and dependencies properties
key_functions: onDateChange(task: Task): void - Handles task date changes via drag
onProgressChange(task: Task, progress: number): void - Updates task completion
onDelete(task: Task): void - Handles task deletion
onExpanderClick(task: Task): void - Toggles project/group expansion
task_types: milestone - Point marker (similar to orange diamonds in design)
project - Grouping/parent task with collapsible children

gotchas: Requires importing CSS file for proper styling
Dependencies are defined as string array of task IDs
Task type must be one of: 'task', 'milestone', or 'project'
Start and end dates must be JavaScript Date objects
integrations_researched.recommendation_reason: Well-maintained, TypeScript-native, MIT licensed, has all required features (dependencies, milestones, hierarchy), simple API

integrations_researched.name: SVAR React Gantt

verified_package.name: @svar-ui/react-gantt
verified_package.license: MIT (open-source) / GPLv3, with PRO edition available

key_functions: tasks - Array of task objects with id, text, start, end, duration, progress
links - Array of dependency objects with id, source, target, type

gotchas: Dependencies (links) are managed separately from tasks array
Some advanced features require PRO edition
Link types not fully documented in free version
integrations_researched.recommendation_reason: Modern library with good documentation, but less GitHub activity than gantt-task-react, and some features require PRO edition

integrations_researched.name: Frappe Gantt (React wrappers)

api_patterns.initialization: React wrapper around vanilla frappe-gantt library
api_patterns.verified_against: Multiple GitHub repositories and npm packages

gotchas: Multiple unmaintained forks - no clear canonical version
Some packages published 5-7 years ago with infrequent updates
Framework-agnostic core means React integration may be less seamless
Limited TypeScript support in some wrappers
integrations_researched.recommendation_reason: Multiple unmaintained forks, unclear which version to use, less feature-rich than alternatives

integrations_researched.name: Material-UI (MUI)

api_patterns.usage: Will be used for Gantt chart wrapper UI (zoom controls, filters, today indicator)

gotchas: Gantt library styling may need to be customized to match MUI theme
Consider using MUI's theme colors for consistency

api_patterns.usage: Date manipulation for timeline calculations, today indicator positioning

recommendations: REASONING: Best balance of features, maintenance, and ease of use. Has all required features from design (hierarchy, dependencies, milestones). TypeScript-native with excellent docs.
Use MUI components for UI controls (zoom buttons, filter button, today indicator label)
Use dayjs for date calculations and today indicator positioning
Consider creating a wrapper component that combines gantt-task-react with MUI styling for consistency
The task data structure should map to project construction phases (Foundation, Framing, etc.)
Implement custom styling to match the blue color scheme from the reference design
Use 'project' type for groups (Foundation, Framing, etc.), 'task' for sub-tasks, and 'milestone' for completion markers

task_hierarchy.description: Collapsible groups like Foundation, Framing, Electrical, Plumbing

task_bars.description: Blue horizontal bars representing task duration

dependencies.description: Gray curved arrows connecting related tasks

milestones.description: Orange diamond markers for key events (Foundation Complete, Roof Tight, Inspections)

today_indicator.description: Red vertical line with 'TODAY - Jan 15, 2024' label
today_indicator.supported_by: Custom implementation using SVG overlay or CSS

timeline_axis.description: Monthly columns from Oct 2023 to Mar 2024

zoom_controls.supported_by: Custom implementation using MUI IconButtons to switch ViewMode

implementation_approach.step_2: Create GanttTimeline component wrapper with MUI layout
implementation_approach.step_3: Define task data structure matching construction project phases
implementation_approach.step_4: Implement custom styling to match blue/orange color scheme
implementation_approach.step_5: Add today indicator overlay using custom SVG or absolute positioned div
implementation_approach.step_6: Add zoom controls using MUI buttons that change ViewMode
implementation_approach.step_7: Add filter functionality using MUI Menu component
implementation_approach.step_8: Customize dependency arrow styling if needed

potential_challenges: Today indicator line may need custom implementation as an overlay
Dependency arrow styling may need customization to match gray curved arrows in design
Color customization to match exact blue shades from reference design
Ensuring proper TypeScript types for all task and event handlers
